about_the_game:
Want to relax a little and immerse yourself in creating a cozy garden? In Dream Garden you can create any kind of garden you want: whether it's a classic Japanese Zen garden or a garden with a pond, fish and lily pads - it's all up to you.

Dream Garden is a simulation game about building tiny cute garden dioramas. A large selection of tools, plants, decorations and customization awaits you. Try all of them and create your dream garden.



Lots of trees, bushes, stones, grass, flowers and more to use in your garden. Complete freedom of action - place decor as you wish, rotate, resize and change properties at absolutely any time. Place items one at a time or use the brush, which allows you to simply paint items all over the garden. You are free to create whatever you want.



Change the landscape, add rivers or lakes, create hills, change the garden fill to sand, grass or pebbles. No presets - you create your own unique garden. Try combining all the tools to get the best looking diorama.



Make your garden truly look like a Japanese zen garden. Create sand patterns, combine them to create your own, or simply move your mouse and let the pattern create itself. Try it, and you'll feel like you're holding a rake and raking sand with it.



Look at your garden under different lighting, time of day, and even time of year. We offer very detailed weather customization. You can not just turn rain on or off, you can customize the strength of the precipitation, not just select one of the four seasons, you can select intermediate seasons such as late fall or early spring, which allows you to achieve results when the grass is already starting to bloom but there is still some snow. Make your garden match your mood.



Relax and immerse yourself in this meditative process of creating a garden. We have done everything so that you can feel the atmosphere and imagine that you are creating this garden not sitting in front of a computer, but sitting in front of this garden live and arranging the decorations by hand and all this is accompanied by hand crafted chill music giving nice touch to the vibe.
